short_summary: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is looking for a contractor to provide a shuttle service for its employees, the service will include a minimum of 6 dedicated vehicles.
description: For the purpose of transporting up to 600 employees a day, the contractor will provide round trips and on-demand shuttle services between DFATD's three main locations and eight satellites sites in Ottawa and Gatineau.
full_summary:
# Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP): DFATD Shuttle Services
## Official Title
- English: Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP): DFATD Shuttle Services
- French: Avis de Projet de Marché (APM): Services de navette du MAECD

## Project Reference and Amendment
- Reference number: cb-7007-75275961
- Amendment number: 1
- Solicitation number: 23-231490

## Key Dates
- Publication date: 6th July 2023
- Tender closing date: 16th August 2023, 14:00:00
- Expected contract start date: 1st November 2023
- Expected contract end date: 31st October 2024

## Procurement Details
- Procurement category: Service
- Procurement method: Competitive – Open Bidding
- Selection criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Trade Agreements
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contract Details
- Regions of delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
- Contracting entity: Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development
- Contracting entity address: 125 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0G4
- Contact person: Tracy Langille
- Contact email: [tracy.langille@international.gc.ca](mailto:tracy.langille@international.gc.ca)
- Contact phone: (613) 791-7144

## Tender Documents
- English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7007/23-231490---npp---dfatd-shuttle-services---en.pdf
- French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7007/23-231490---apm---services-de-navette-du-maecd---
